member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.CrossFadeEffect.CrossFade
member.summary: Specifies the interpolation position between the two images. Default value 0.5, range 0 to 1.

remarks.p: When CrossFade is 0, the Source1 image is output.
When CrossFade is 1, the Source2 image is output.
When CrossFade is 0.5, the output is a 50/50 blend of the two images.
